messages.title: Election Communication
messages.content: Dear Elector, On 7 May 2015 we go to the polls to vote in the UK General Election. With all evidence pointing to another hung parliament, a strong group of SNP MPs can hold the balance of power and ensure that Scotland’s voice is heard at Westminster. If elected to serve the people of North Ayrshire & Arran, I will work hard for local residents and fight tooth and nail to protect the public services we all rely on. Yours faithfully, Patricia

keyPolicies.policyDescription: NHS Budget to increase by £383 million
The UK's most competitive business tax environment
